com.example.demo - package com.example.demo
 
com.example.demo.controller - package com.example.demo.controller
 
com.example.demo.dto - package com.example.demo.dto
 
com.example.demo.entity - package com.example.demo.entity
 
com.example.demo.exception - package com.example.demo.exception
 
com.example.demo.repository - package com.example.demo.repository
 
com.example.demo.service - package com.example.demo.service
 
createQuestion(QuestionDTO) - Method in class com.example.demo.controller.QuestionController
POST request, takes a question object, saves it in the database, returns question object with the id and status 201 CREATED
createQuestion(QuestionDTO) - Method in class com.example.demo.service.QuestionService
Method converts question DTO to entity, saves it in the repository, converts question to DTO, returns question DTO.
createReply(ReplyDTO, Long) - Method in class com.example.demo.controller.QuestionController
POST request, takes a reply object and id of the question, saves reply in the database, returns reply object with the id and status 201 CREATED
createReply(ReplyDTO, Long) - Method in class com.example.demo.service.QuestionService
Method converts reply DTO to entity, finds question by questionId, saves reply in the repository, converts reply to DTO, returns reply DTO.
